about.text_1: I'm Hyunsoo, a developer seeking charming interfaces.
about.text_2: I recently worked at LG Electronics as a web and app developer, employed by Rayslon Company.
about.text_3: I'm confident in front-end technologies like JavaScript, React, and Next, but I also have experience with back-end technologies.
about.text_4: I may not be exceptionally talented, but I will do well.

text_5._3: lately, I find myself often thinking about

about.text_6: GPT-4의 도움을 받는 것에 관심이 많습니다.
about.text_7: 목표를 향해 땀흘리며 뛰는 것보다는, 꾸준하게 걸어 나아가는 편입니다.
about.text_8: 언더프레셔 보다는 여유에서 일을 더 잘합니다. 좋은 방법은 다음날 떠오를 때가 많더라구요:)
